body_html: @apaszke The dataloader API accepts a sampler object, and reset it at each call to the dataloader iterator. while I agree with your concern that if we need to change the samplers's behavior between epochs, I am not sure if we have a real use right now. From what I understand from the users is that they want some form of uniform randomization of the data. If we can add something like begin_epoch() method to the dataloader, then we can do all sort of customizations.
